Supports SCORM 1.2, SCORM 2004, and xAPI packages

Tips for Good Packages

  • Use clear, descriptive titles
  • Test your SCORM package before uploading
  • Include learning objectives
  • Add preview screenshots or videos
  • Price competitively based on content depth
